body_html:
Same Problem (not able to import tensorflow and torch together)
pip3 install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu80/torch-0.3.0.post4-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl worked for me
(previously i was using -
pip3 install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu75/torch-0.2.0.post3-cp36-cp36m-manylinux1_x86_64.whl)

It works now, though only in the following order of imports:

import torch
import tensorflow

body:
Same Problem (not able to import tensorflow and torch together)
`pip3 install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu80/torch-0.3.0.post4-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl ` worked for me 
(previously i was using -
`pip3 install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu75/torch-0.2.0.post3-cp36-cp36m-manylinux1_x86_64.whl`)

It works now, though only in the following order of imports:
```
import torch
import tensorflow
```
